Hero.title: MODERN WEB AGENCY
Hero.description: We specialize in building high-performance websites and immersive 3D experiences using modern, custom-built technology

Present.title: Superfast websites – built for performance and growth

customDesign.title: Custom design that reflects you
customDesign.description: No templates. No compromises. We design every pixel to match your brand and make you stand out.

easyToManage.title: Easy to manage
easyToManage.description: Update your content in seconds. Our built-in dashboard gives you full control.

blazingFast.title: Blazing fast, everywhere
blazingFast.description: No more sluggish load times. Your site is built for speed – on mobile, desktop and all between.

builtToGrow.title: Built to grow with your business
builtToGrow.description: From small team to full-scale operation. Your website is flexible, future-proof, and ready to scale with you.

Preview.title: Your Dashboard, Your Way
Preview.subtitle: Stay in control with a dashboard built around you

header.title: This is how our customer process looks like!
header.description-second: through every step with clarity, creativity, and care.

discoveryStrategy.title: Discovery & Strategy
discoveryStrategy.subtitle: From Vision to Roadmap
discoveryStrategy.description: Just like any great expedition, your project begins with a clear destination and a solid route. We explore your goals, understand your market, and build a step-by-step plan to reach your digital summit.
steps: Create a strategic map with key checkpoints
Set clear scope and timeframes for the journey

designExperience.title: Design & Experience
designExperience.subtitle: Shaping the Experience
designExperience.description: With the journey mapped, we bring it to life. Starting with wireframes, we layer in clarity, emotion, and interaction—designing every screen to feel effortless and aligned with your goals.
steps: Map the user journey with intent
Design responsive layouts across all devices
Focus relentlessly on user needs and simplicity

developmentIntegration.title: Development & Integration
developmentIntegration.subtitle: Building Solid Foundations
developmentIntegration.description: We turn designs into powerful, scalable, and future-proof digital solutions — ready to grow with your business needs.

launchSupport.title: Launch & Support
launchSupport.subtitle: Bringing It to Life – and Beyond
launchSupport.description: Launching is just the beginning. We make sure your website goes live without a hitch – and we stay with you to ensure it continues to perform, evolve, and support your business goals.

Pricing.title: Flexible Packages, Clear Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose a solution that fits your needs and budget – no surprises, just results

ContactPage.title: Start the dialogue
ContactPage.subtitle: - completely non-binding
ContactPage.contactPrompt: Contact us today – we will quickly get back to you with an estimate or a discussion about the solution.
ContactPage.ambitionMessage: We love ambitious ideas and are happy to help make them a reality.

section1.title: 1. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
section1.description: When you use our price calculator or fill out a contact form on Arzonic Agency's website, we collect and process the following information:

list.name: Name
list.details: Any details you provide in your message or request

section1.note: This information is used solely to respond to your inquiry, prepare a quote, and follow up if necessary.

section2.title: 2. Data Retention and Deletion
section2.description: Your data is stored securely and confidentially.

list.noCustomer: If no customer relationship is established, your data will be automatically deleted after 30 days.
list.customer: If you become a customer, we will retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services or comply with legal obligations.

section2.note: You may request early deletion by contacting us at mail@arzonic.com.

section3.title: 3. Disclosure of Information
section3.description: We do not share your information with third parties unless it is necessary to fulfill your request (e.g., a subcontractor). If this is the case, it will only be done with your prior consent.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights

list.access: Access the data we hold about you
list.delete: Request deletion of your data (unless retention is required by law)
list.withdraw: Withdraw your consent to data processing

section4.note: To exercise your rights, contact us at mail@arzonic.com.

section5.title: 5. Consent
section5.description1: By submitting your information through our website, you consent to the processing of your data as described above.
section5.description2: You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us. If there is no legal reason to retain your data, it will be deleted upon request.

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.

section7.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
section7.description: We reserve the right to update this Consent & Privacy Policy. The most recent version will always be available on our website.

TermsModal.title: Terms of Service
TermsModal.effectiveNote: These terms apply to all agreements entered into after this date.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.description: These terms apply to all services and products provided by Arzonic Agency to our clients. By using our website or services, you agree to these terms.

section2.title: 2. Services
section2.description: We provide digital consultancy and ready-made solutions including web development, 3D design, and maintenance. Scope is agreed individually.

section3.title: 3. Payment and Invoicing
section3.description: Payment is due upon invoice unless otherwise agreed. Payment terms: 8 days net. Late payments may incur fees and interest according to law.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.description: All materials developed by Arzonic remain our property unless otherwise agreed in writing. The client receives a usage license.

section5.title: 5. Liability and Limitations
section5.description: We disclaim responsibility for indirect losses, third-party software issues, and force majeure events.

section6.title: 6. Cooperation and Changes
section6.description: The client must respond in a timely manner. Changes must be agreed in writing. Lack of cooperation may affect delivery.

section7.title: 7. Termination
section7.description: Ongoing agreements can be terminated with one month’s notice. Immediate termination may occur in case of material breach.

section8.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section8.description: Disputes are governed by Danish law with jurisdiction in the Court of Hillerød.

section9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
section9.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms. The latest version is always available on our website.

CallToAction.collaborationMessage: At Arzonic, we collaborate with ambitious companies across Europe. No matter where you are, we are ready to elevate your digital presence!

custom-websites.hero: Professional, custom websites that put your business in focus.
custom-websites.body: Your website is often your first impression—and it needs to be perfect. We build tailored websites focused on your brand, goals, and target audience. Enjoy lightning-fast loading speeds, mobile-friendly design, and a flexible structure ready to scale.
custom-websites.processTitle: The process to make a customized website
custom-websites.cta: Ready to elevate your business online?

web-applications.hero: Digital solutions designed to streamline your operations and boost productivity.
web-applications.body: We create user-friendly web applications tailored to your business needs. Whether it's internal dashboards, customer-facing tools, or complex platforms, our solutions prioritize usability, speed, and security, helping your business grow efficiently.
web-applications.processTitle: Our process making a Web Application
web-applications.cta: Let’s turn your digital vision into reality.

3d-visualization.hero: Stunning 3D visualizations that showcase your products and ideas clearly.
3d-visualization.body: Bring your products and projects to life with professional 3D visuals. We produce realistic renders and animations perfect for presentations, sales materials, or interactive web experiences, enhancing your brand’s appeal and customer engagement.
3d-visualization.cta: Showcase your business with impactful 3D visuals.

design-animation.hero: Memorable designs and animations that captivate your audience.
design-animation.body: Elevate your brand with powerful graphic designs and engaging animations. From distinctive brand identities to interactive animated content, we create visuals that clearly communicate your message and leave a lasting impression.
design-animation.processTitle: The process of creating graphic design and animation

emptyState.title: No cases found
emptyState.description: We are working on adding more cases. Check back soon!

jobsPage.noOpenings: We currently have no open positions, but we're always happy to hear from talented and passionate individuals. You're very welcome to send us an unsolicited application.

intro.title: Find out your project’s price
intro.subtitle: Answer just 4 quick questions and get a tailored price estimate. 100% free, no strings attached

form.title: Your estimate is ready!
form.subtitle: Fill in your details to receive your custom estimate. We’ll send it directly to your inbox – no spam, no obligation

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.message: We’ve received your request and will get back to you soon.

aboutPage.metaDescription: We are Arzonic – a modern digital agency focused on web solutions, 3D, and user experience.
aboutPage.textOne: Arzonic is a creative digital agency built on passion, curiosity, and a shared love for craftsmanship. We're a diverse team of specialists and newly graduated talents, each deeply engaged in our craft – from web development and UI/UX to 3D visualization and animation.
aboutPage.textTwo: Our mindset is fresh and solution-driven. We don’t do cookie-cutter work – we explore what’s possible. Rooted in hobby projects and driven by a constant desire to learn, we create digital experiences that both perform and inspire.

notFound.message: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist.
